header.subtitol: Aspiring to make my first steps in the industry

presentacio: I am a third-year Computer Engineering student eager to take my first steps in the industry. With an open attitude, I am focused on learning, achieving goals, and leveraging my skills to support teams and help companies grow.

projectes.descripcio: I independently modified a game to improve some mechanics, driven by curiosity and a desire to experiment with game development.

I created and managed an online game server for my friends, learning technical aspects like server configuration and game modifications, as well as creative aspects such as organizing events and managing interactions and conflicts between players.

rendiment: Academically, I consider myself a good student. Although my average grade is 7.1, I have never had to retake an exam and have felt comfortable with all subjects.
experiencia: Although I do not have professional experience yet, I bring technical solidity and commitment to learn and contribute effectively within a team.

formacio.descripcio: Currently in my third year of studies
